meanings.definition: A pair of eyeglasses with round lenses.
meanings.sent1: She wore her stylish lunettes to read the book.
meanings.sent2: He always carries his lunettes in a protective case.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear the lunettes but couldn't see through them.
meanings.sent4: Her lunettes were like windows to the world around her.
meanings.sent5: The lunettes perched on his nose, giving him a scholarly look.

meanings.sent1: The park had a beautiful lunettes by the lake.
meanings.sent2: The lunettes of green grass contrasted with the blue sky.
meanings.sent3: The lunettes of sand looked like a smile on the beach.
meanings.sent4: The lunettes of trees formed a natural border around the field.
meanings.sent5: The lunettes of flowers bloomed in the garden, creating a colorful display.

meanings.definition: A type of architectural element in the form of a semicircular opening.
meanings.sent1: The ancient building had intricate lunettes above the doors.
meanings.sent2: The lunettes in the cathedral added a touch of elegance to the design.
meanings.sent3: The lunettes in the castle made it look like a giant smile.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight streamed through the lunettes, illuminating the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the lunettes with vibrant colors, enhancing the architecture.
